        public double nextUniform(double a,
                 double b)
        Generates a random double in range [a, b)
        Specified by:
        nextUniform in interface RandomNumberGenerator
        Parameters:
        a - The lower bound of a support of the generated random variable. a must be no greater than b.
        b - The upper bound of a support of the generated random variable. b must be no less than a.
        Returns:
        A random double between a (including) and 1 (excluding)

      • nextNormal

        public double nextNormal(double mu,
                double sigma)
        Generates a normal variable with specified mean and standard deviation.
        Specified by:
        nextNormal in interface RandomNumberGenerator
        Parameters:
        mu - The mean of the generated random variable.
        sigma - The standard deviation of the generated random variable. Must be greater than 0.
        Returns:
        A normal random variable with mean mu and standard deviation sigma.

      • nextLogNormal

        public double nextLogNormal(double mu,
                   double sigma)
        Generates a log-normal random variable with specified shape and log-scale parameter.
        Specified by:
        nextLogNormal in interface RandomNumberGenerator
        Parameters:
        mu - The log-scale parameter. mu is the mean of the natural logarithm of the generated random variable.
        sigma - The shape parameter. sigma is the standard deviation of the natural logarithm of the generated random variable. sigma must be greater than 0.
        Returns:
        A log-normal random variable with log-scale parameter mu and shape parameter sigma.

      • nextGamma

        public double nextGamma(double alpha,
               double beta)
        Generates a gamma random variable with specified shape and rate parameters.
        Specified by:
        nextGamma in interface RandomNumberGenerator
        Parameters:
        alpha - The shape parameter of the gamma distribution. alpha must be greater than 0.
        beta - The rate parameter of the gamma distribution. beta must be greater than 0.
        Returns:
        A gamma variable with shape parameter alpha and rate parameter beta.

      • nextStudentT

        public double nextStudentT(double nu)
        Generates a Student-t random variable with specified degrees-of-freedom parameter.
        Specified by:
        nextStudentT in interface RandomNumberGenerator
        Parameters:
        nu - The degrees-of-freedom parameter. Must be greater than 0.
        Returns:
        A Student-t random variable with nu degrees of freedom.

      • nextExponential

        public double nextExponential(double mu)
        Generates an exponential random variable with scale parameter mu.
        Specified by:
        nextExponential in interface RandomNumberGenerator
        Parameters:
        mu - Scale parameter. The mean of the random variable to be generated equals mu. mu must be greater than 0.
        Returns:
        An exponential random variable with scale parameter mu.
